author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, part of the migrations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404.
Removed most of the `CMSDEPRECATED_X` warnings in the `RecoTracker` subsystem from `CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2022-02-11-2300`.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: remove more `CMSDEPRECATED_X` warnings from `RecoTracker`
